img_summary: The image depicts the "Nine-Capped Lingzhi," a rare medicine ingredient featured in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is associated with gameplay elements such as crafting or healing and can be obtained randomly from Purple Lingzhi plants or by defeating Lingzhiling enemies. The image serves as a visual reference for players to identify this specific in-game item.
